column4: question: whats the simplest way to find out what an applications executable name is?  example:  i want to add "Application launcher" as a launcher to my panel... what is the name of the binary?
can u drag and drop stuff on panel?
well, use some guesswork then and see if it autocompletes
most app have same binary name too
hmm for gnome apps it mostly start with gnome-bla bla
check process list for name maybe
i cant figure out what its called in gnome :D
yeah finder is launcher... wow, that was more difficult than it need to be.. i see why people seem to prefer gnome/kde now... however i refuse to give up on xfce.. its just so sexy
i just noticefd, if you open the icon chooser for a new panel app it tells you the name sof the apps as the icon name
